duties_responsibilities.duty: Inspect guest rooms, counsel and interview employees, and resolve guest complaints.
Perform general office duties and responsibilities.
Have open availability and work a flexible schedule, including mornings, evenings, weekends, and holidays.
Repetitively lift, push, pull, and carry a moderate amount of weight and be able to twist, bend, and squat frequently.
Ability to work a flexible schedule that will likely include weekends and holidays.
